title: Beautiful Community with Great Amenities & Spacious Homes! - MFTE
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 933 Sq.
Clean, uncluttered lines, natural, abundant light, and quality materials complement a lifestyle of Scandinavian design.
Combined with superior functionality, home is as comfy as it is contemporary.
Ballard’s finest, designed to inspire—some even with their very own panoramic view of the water.
Home doesn’t get much better than this.

Superior sound proofing, True one-bedroom apartments, Ceiling fans, Contemporary, custom two-toned cabinetry, Concrete construction for floor-to-ceiling sound proofing, Vinyl plank wood flooring throughout living spaces, Stainless steel appliances, A Boutique Community, Balconies, Programmable thermostats, Olympic Mountains, cityscape & water views available, Matching quartz countertops, Pantry, Custom carpeting in bedroom(s), Courtyard + patio, Full designer backsplash, A/C ready, Walk-in closets, USB plug connections, Under-mount sinks in kitchen & bathroom(s), TV wall mount ready, Exterior sunshades

Maintenance available Monday-Friday 7AM-3PM, Rooftop sink & barbecue, 100% residential building, Bike storage, wash & tuning station, Controlled FOB remote access, Controlled access bike room, Beautiful, landscaped rooftop plaza, 24-hour access gym facility, Rooftop lounge area, Locally owned and managed, Rooftop pet park & wash station, Electric car charging stations, Smoke-free building, Pet-friendly, Storage lockers, Free WiFi in lobby and rooftop, Rooftop fire pit, Underground parking, Garbage chute
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
